item.title: Understanding SBOM - Definition, Relationships, Differences, Best Practices, and Generation Tools
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article introduces the definition of SBOM, its relationship and differences with SLSA and Black Duck, best practices, and available generation tools, helping readers better understand and apply SBOM.
